sentences.en: Dan was doing his utmost to be helpful.
Each man is free to exercise his special talents to the utmost.
sentences.cn: 每个人都可以尽力发挥他的专长.

sentences.en: He showed the greatest [ the utmost ] patience .
sentences.cn: 他表现出最大的 耐心.

sentences.en: He walked to the utmost edge of the cliff.
sentences.cn: 他走到悬崖的最边缘的地方.

sentences.en: He would keep his pledge to the utmost of his power.
sentences.cn: 他将极力信守他的誓言.

sentences.en: I was treated with the utmost courtesy by the staff.
sentences.cn: 我受到了工作人员极有礼貌的接待。

sentences.en: It is a matter of the utmost urgency to find out what has happened to these people.
sentences.cn: 当务之急是弄清楚这些人出了什么事。

sentences.en: It is a matter of utmost urgency.
My limited diplomatic skills were tested to the utmost.
sentences.cn: 我有限的外交手腕儿受到了极其严峻的考验。

sentences.en: One thing is certain, both have the utmost respect for each other.
sentences.cn: 有一点可以肯定，那就是双方都非常尊重对方。

sentences.en: Security matters are treated with the utmost seriousness.
sentences.cn: 安全问题受到极为严肃的对待。

sentences.en: That is the utmost that I can do.
The ability for him to get the job is utmost.
sentences.cn: 他得到这份工作的可能性极大.

sentences.en: The ambassador did his utmost to prevent the outbreak of hostilities.
sentences.cn: 这位大使竭尽全力防止战事的爆发.

sentences.en: The medical staff did their utmost(= tried as hard as they could ) to save the patient’s life.
sentences.cn: 医护人员竭尽全力挽救那位病人的生命。

sentences.en: They mean to bleed the British to the utmost.
sentences.cn: 他们要最大限度地榨取英国人的财富。

sentences.en: This is a matter of the utmost importance.
sentences.cn: 这是个极其重要的问题。

sentences.en: Utmost care must be taken not to spill any of the contents.
sentences.cn: 千万注意里面的东西一点都不能洒出来。

sentences.en: You should proceed with the utmost caution.

trans.tran_en: You can use utmost to emphasize the importance or seriousness of something or to emphasize the way that it is done
the most that can be done
